decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the side elevations of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions, hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building and/or details specified within the submission documents.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Site Location Plan entitled Planning Portal Reference: PP-13236754v1;</li><li>Block Plan entitled Drawing No: SP0101;</li><li>Proposed Floor, Elevations and Roof Plans entitled Drawing No: A0102 - V01, dated July 11th 2024;</li><li>Fire Safety Statement received 21/10/2024;</li></ul>

The development hereby permitted shall
be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey front extension incorporating front porch; single and two storey side to rear extension; single storey rear extension
